name: Virus Simulator 2019 (haxxor edition)
description:
You are the world #1 hacker and want to go a step further with your skills. Your goal? Contaminate 100% of all computers worldwide. Now white hats are on your tracks, so your time is limited. Good luck!

Random events happens throughout the game. Popups need to be answered correctly, cmd prompts needs to be filled. All of this has to be done very quickly.

This is a project made for my first ever Game Jam, which was also the first time i used Unity3D. Recipe for best game quality ever.

If you want to donate to support the development of this blockbuster of a game, i suggest doing so
